      • listUpdates

        public RemoteDataStorage.DatasetUpdates listUpdates(java.lang.String datasetName,
                                                    long lastSyncCount)
        Description copied from interface: RemoteDataStorage
        Gets a list of records which have been updated since lastSyncCount (inclusive). If the value of a record equals null, then the record is deleted. If you pass 0 as lastSyncCount, the full list of records will be returned.
        Specified by:
        listUpdates in interface RemoteDataStorage
        Parameters:
        datasetName - the dataset name
        lastSyncCount - non negative long integer
        Returns:
        A list of records which have been updated since lastSyncCount.

      • putRecords

        public java.util.List<Record> putRecords(java.lang.String datasetName,
                                         java.util.List<Record> records,
                                         java.lang.String syncSessionToken,
                                         java.lang.String deviceId)
        Description copied from interface: RemoteDataStorage
        Post updates to remote storage. Each record has a sync count. If the sync count doesn't match what's on the remote storage, i.e. the record is modified by a different device, this operation throws ConflictException. Otherwise it returns a list of records that are updated successfully.
        Specified by:
        putRecords in interface RemoteDataStorage
        Parameters:
        datasetName - the dataset name
        records - list of records to be updated remotely
        syncSessionToken - the sync session token retrieved from RemoteDataStorage.listUpdates(String, long)
        deviceId - the string deviceId for use with push sync updates, null otherwise

      • subscribeToDataset

        public void subscribeToDataset(java.lang.String datasetName,
                               java.lang.String deviceId)
        Description copied from interface: RemoteDataStorage
        Subscribes the user to update notifications for a dataset. This should only be called after the device has been registered.
        Specified by:
        subscribeToDataset in interface RemoteDataStorage
        Parameters:
        datasetName - the name of the dataset to be subscribed to
        deviceId - the id of the device to subscribe
